file_content.text: You again? What are you doing here?
I've restored control to the bridge; get your marines back in the fight.
No time for questions.
Don't go barking orders at me, mongrel.
You don't give the orders on this ship.
Door was open, thought I'd crash your party.
What do you think?
Well, at least the bridge is back under Imperial control.
Shut up and fetch the CO.
Buzz off, lackey.
I am the senior officer on this bridge.
Ensign, status!
Sir, lockdown protocols are still in effect. The--the security network is responding to commands. Orders?
We take this ship back.
You. Keep the bridge secure while we disable the lockdown.
Understood.
Sir, yes, sir.
Fine, whatever.
Sorry, didn't catch that over the attitude.
Say "please."
I won't tolerate insubordination. I gave you a direct order!
They're coming...! We can't possibly repel another assault!
Please! Fight them off... please!
You must be the bounty hunter Captain Evlen contacted. Thanks for the rescue.
Once they killed the captain, we thought the fight was as good as done.
I've restored control to the bridge.
Everything's okay.
All in a day's work.
We aren't out of the fire yet.
Just because he's dead doesn't mean this was a freebie.
I still expect payment.
Oh--yes. Of course. We're in your debt.
We need a few minutes to override the lockdown, but we're finished if we have to hold off another attack.
Will you assist in defending the bridge?
Anyone stepping through that door gets blasted back out.
Consider it taken care of.
I didn't blast through here because I was bored.
I was gonna do it anyway.
Ah--no, of course not. Um, thank you.
Do I really have a choice?
Am I supposed to say no?
Well, I suppose not.
Get those lower decks unsealed ASAP.
